body_html:
Hi, i met the same problem . it work well on pytorch 0.4.0, but got error on pytorch 0.4.1
here is my commands
conda install pytorch torchvision cuda80 -c pytorch
when i import torch , i got the error:
from torch._C import *
ImportError: /root/anaconda3/envs/maskrcnn/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libshm.so: undefined symbol: _ZTI24THRefcountedMapAllocator

if you solve your problems, could you share it with me?
thanks a lot

body:
Hi, i met the same problem .  it work well on pytorch 0.4.0, but got error on pytorch 0.4.1
here is my commands
conda install pytorch torchvision cuda80 -c pytorch
when i import torch , i got the error:
     from torch._C import *
ImportError: /root/anaconda3/envs/maskrcnn/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libshm.so: undefined symbol: _ZTI24THRefcountedMapAllocator

if you  solve your problems, could you share it with me? 
thanks a lot
